citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The facility has recently employed a new attending veterinarian and does not currently have a written program of
veterinary care documenting this arrangement nor have they established regularly scheduled visits to the premises. A
written program of veterinary care and regularly scheduled visits by the attending veterinarian are important for ensuring
adequate veterinary care is provided for the animals on site. Correct by April 17, 2023, by documenting a written program
of veterinary care and scheduling regular premises visits in collaboration with the new attending veterinarian.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The facility has recently employed a new attending veterinarian and does not currently have a written program of 
veterinary care documenting this arrangement nor have they established regularly scheduled visits to the premises. A 
written program of veterinary care and regularly scheduled visits by the attending veterinarian are important for ensuring 
adequate veterinary care is provided for the animals on site. Correct by April 17, 2023, by documenting a written program 
of veterinary care and scheduling regular premises visits in collaboration with the new attending veterinarian. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
End Section
